## SwapOptions.toMargin property

True if output token amount is kept within the contract. The [DefaultOptions.recipient](./rmm-sdk.defaultoptions.recipient.md) margin account is credited.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toMargin: boolean;
```
